channel.title: Lunar sendquest ids

item.title: Lunar sendquest ids
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

whats the sendquests ids for all lunar teles ?

example (what i have for ancients)

[code]//ancient

c.sendQuest("Train", 13037);
c.sendQuest("Start Your journey", 13038);
c.sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13042);
c.sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13043);
c.sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13044);

c.sendQuest("BETA", 13047);
c.sendQuest("Soon to come", 13048);
c.sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13051);
c.sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13052);

c.sendQuest("Beta", 13055);
c.sendQuest("Soon to come", 13056);
c.sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13059);
c.sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13060);

c.sendQuest("Beta", 13063);
c.sendQuest("Soon to come", 13064);
c.sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13067);
c.sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13068);

c.sendQuest("Beta", 13071);

c.sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13076);
c.sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13077);
c.sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13078);

c.sendQuest("Beta", 13081);

c.sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13086);

c.sendQuest("Beta", 13089);

c.sendQuest("Beta", 13097);

c.sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13101);
c.sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13102);[/code]
